messages.subject: Thank goodness I am on the unschooling path
messages.msgSnippet: I was reading an article this morning on the MSN homepage called Pick Happy how kids teach parents to enjoy simple things, it sounded a lot like unschooling.
messages.messageBody:
I was reading an article this morning on the MSN homepage called "Pick Happy" how kids teach parents to enjoy simple things, it sounded a lot like unschooling. On the radio I was listening to the news about a 4 year old girl who was killed accidently by a 89 year old woman who was driving (I didn't hear the details as to what exactly happened) and thinking to myself I am sooooo glad I am on the unschooling path. Life is too short to live with limits, restrictions and worrying about the small stuff.

Take care,
Jen
